translation.en: [man] I was there when everything changed.
translation.de: Ich war dabei, als alles anders wurde.

translation.en: Forty years ago.
[man] It was our third world war, and humanity was determined to end itself.
translation.de: Es war unser Dritter Weltkrieg. Und die Menschheit war entschlossen, sich auszulöschen.

translation.en: [man] Then, on the edge of annihilation,
an alien saved us.
[man] He smashed our tools of war.
[man] He forced us to stop fighting,
translation.de: Er zwang uns, das Kämpfen einzustellen,

translation.en: and shut down World War III in one fucking day.
translation.de: und beendete den Dritten Weltkrieg an nur einem verdammten Tag.

translation.en: We called him
[man] For the first time in history,
translation.de: Zum ersten Mal in der Geschichte

translation.en: world peace appeared possible.
-Good evening, America. -Mom?
I'm award-winning journalist Van Dawson, and this is Van Dawson Tonight.
translation.de: Ich bin der preisgekrönte Journalist Van Dawson. Sie sehen Van Dawson Tonight.

translation.en: We eagerly await the 40th anniversary of Marvelous Man Day.
translation.de: Wir erwarten mit Spannung den 40. Marvelous-Man-Tag.

translation.en: The day Marvelous Man appeared from the sky
translation.de: Der Tag, an dem Marvelous Man vom Himmel kam

translation.en: to single-handedly end World War III.
translation.de: und den Dritten Weltkrieg ganz allein beendete.

translation.en: Will our first superhero continue to remain staunchly neutral in human conflicts?
translation.de: Bleibt unser erster Superheld bei menschlichen Konflikten neutral?

translation.en: Will he act against the expansionist hive mind Anubis?
translation.de: Wird er gegen die expansionistische Schwarmintelligenz Anubis vorgehen?

translation.en: Will he condemn President Nick Nukem's aggressive military rhetoric?
translation.de: Wird er Präsident Nick Nukems aggressive Militär-Rhetorik verurteilen?

translation.en: We now go live to the Citadel of Justice,
translation.de: Jetzt live zur Festung der Gerechtigkeit,

translation.en: where Marvelous Man is moments away from giving his yearly M Day address.
translation.de: wo Marvelous Man gleich seine jährliche M-Day-Ansprache hält.

translation.en: [man singing] M Day!
[man singing] M Day!
People of Earth…
this is Marvelous Man.
Come on! Come on! Check this out!
Look at that. That's my hero!
translation.de: Sieh mal. Das ist mein Held!

translation.en: For four decades, I have protected you.
translation.de: Vier Jahrzehnte lang habe ich euch beschützt.

translation.en: I saved you.
Boom!
I don't feel anything.
I'm a prisoner in this bulletproof skin.
translation.de: Ich bin ein Gefangener in dieser kugelsicheren Haut.

translation.en: Why does Marvelous Man look so sad, Mom?
translation.de: Warum sieht Marvelous Man so traurig aus, Mom?

translation.en: And when I close my eyes,
this is what I hear.
[man] Please, help me!
Why? Why didn't you save us?
translation.de: Warum hast du uns nicht gerettet?

translation.en: -[man] Why didn't you save us? -[woman] Where are you?
translation.de: -Warum hast du uns nicht gerettet? -Wo bist du?

translation.en: -[man] You're supposed to be our savior! -[woman] Where are you? Where are you?
-Where are you? -[man] Our savior!
[Marvelous Man] If I sleep,
people die.
Real inspiring speech, Cal.
Wait, is…
is that caltronite?
No! [exhales]
[whispers] What?
I'm tired of hiding.
I'm tired.
So I've found my escape.
No. Don't do this, Cal!
I found it.
-No! -What happened?
-[The Speed] Cecilia? -[Cecilia] Yeah?
Are we live?
Marvelous Man is dead.
Clear my schedule.
What we have just witnessed
is obviously a dark day for mankind.
translation.de: ist ein düsterer Tag für die Menschheit.

translation.en: There are no words to properly express
what just happened
and what we have lost
as a nation,
as a species,
as a planet.
[man] Fatality.
[female computer] The Guardians of Justice will save you.
translation.de: Die Guardians of Justice retten euch.

translation.en: My fellow Americans,
an immigrant from another planet came to our shores
translation.de: Ein Einwanderer von einem anderen Planeten kam zu uns

translation.en: and made not only a life for himself,
translation.de: und baute sich nicht nur ein Leben auf,

translation.en: but created a lasting legacy as well.
In the wake of his death,
America will continue to protect the legacy of Marvelous Man.
translation.de: wird Amerika weiterhin Marvelous Mans Vermächtnis schützen.

translation.en: We will prevent the escalation of nuclear conflict.
We will curtail the homosexual epidemic that is gripping our great nation.
translation.de: Wir dämmen die homosexuelle Epidemie ein, die unsere große Nation erfasst hat.

translation.en: Asshole!
And I promise you that even with Marvelous Man gone,
translation.de: Und ich verspreche Ihnen, auch ohne Marvelous Man

translation.en: our enemies will continue to fear us.
translation.de: werden unsere Feinde uns weiterhin fürchten.

translation.en: God bless you, and God bless America.
translation.de: Gott segne Sie. Und Gott segne Amerika.

translation.en: We're fucked, people!
Aw, Phil.
Now that Marvelous Man is gone, who is going to save us?
translation.de: Marvelous Man ist weg. Wer rettet uns jetzt?

translation.en: People on the streets are going crazy. It's as if the whole world has…
translation.de: Die Leute drehen durch. Fast so, als hätte die ganze Welt

translation.en: has lost all hope.
[man] The year is 1960.
Marvelous Man has brought rapid technological advancement,
translation.de: Der rasche technische Fortschritt durch Marvelous Man

translation.en: causing social turmoil and an escalation of street-level violence.
[man] In this asphalt jungle, we join a lone vigilante, the Knight Hawk,
translation.de: Im Asphaltdschungel führt der einsame Wächter Knight Hawk

translation.en: conducting a crusade against costumed crime kingpin The Demander.
translation.de: einen Kreuzzug gegen den Gangsterboss mit Maske, The Demander.

translation.en: [man] In this moment of peril, a god aligned himself with a man.
translation.de: Im Moment der Gefahr half ein Gott einem Menschen.

translation.en: Together, they would forge a friendship
that became the cornerstone of the Guardians of Justice.
translation.de: wurde zum Grundpfeiler der Guardians of Justice.

translation.en: [reporter] For our next segment,
translation.de: Gleich: ein Exklusivinterview mit der früheren CIA-Agentin,

translation.en: an exclusive interview with the former CIA operative who stole a god's heart.
translation.de: Gleich: ein Exklusivinterview mit der früheren CIA-Agentin, in die sich ein Gott verliebte.

translation.en: America's princess, now America's widow,
And we're live in three, two…
translation.de: Und wir sind live in drei, zwei…

translation.en: Ms. Louis, you have my condolences.
The world shares your grief.
How are you processing what your husband has done?
translation.de: Wie verkraften Sie, was Ihr Mann getan hat?

translation.en: He wouldn't do that.
He wouldn't do that to the world, to the Guardians,
translation.de: Er würde es der Welt nicht antun, den Guardians,

translation.en: to me.
I think there can be no question Marvelous Man committed suicide.
translation.de: Es steht außer Frage, dass Marvelous Man Selbstmord beging.

translation.en: [Laura] You don't know what you're talking about.
I've been watching it and re-watching it over and over and over again.
translation.de: Ich habe es mir immer und immer wieder angesehen.

translation.en: He was murdered.
Murdered?
[in Arabic] Shocking revelations from Marvelous Man's widow.
[in Hebrew] Was Marvelous Man murdered? We will investigate the allegations tonight at ten…
translation.de: Wurde Marvelous Man ermordet? Heute Abend haken wir nach.

translation.en: [reporter in French] Suicide or murder?
The world demands answers. The last 24 hours have shaken our planet to its core.
translation.de: Die letzten 24 Stunden haben die Welt erschüttert.

translation.en: If you're right, then there's one question the world needs answered.
translation.de: Falls es so ist, braucht die Welt eine Antwort.

translation.en: Who, if anyone, killed Marvelous Man?
translation.de: Wer, wenn überhaupt, hat Marvelous Man getötet?

translation.en: We need to hear from the Guardians of Justice,
translation.de: Die Guardians of Justice müssen sich äußern,

translation.en: and specifically from Marvelous Man's second-in-command.
Knight Hawk, where are you?
[Knight Hawk] Computer, call the Guardians.
King Tsunami here.
Speed here.
Mm. Awsome Man present.
Sorry. I'm eating a taco.
Black Bow here.
[Knight Hawk] With Marvelous Man gone, it's time to suit up,
translation.de: Marvelous Man ist tot. Also rein ins Kostüm.

translation.en: assume control of the Guardians, and protect the planet.
translation.de: Wir leiten die Guardians jetzt selbst und beschützen den Planeten.

translation.en: [man] Golden Goddess!
[Knight Hawk] She's the princess of the god realm.
translation.de: Sie ist die Prinzessin des Götterreichs.

translation.en: [man] The Speed!
[Knight Hawk] The only person faster than Marvelous Man.
translation.de: Sie ist als Einzige schneller als Marvelous Man.

translation.en: [man] Black Bow!
[Knight Hawk] Expert marksman
and reality star.
-[man] Blue-Scream! -[screaming]
[Knight Hawk] Whose sonic scream contains immense power.
[man] King Tsunami!
[Knight Hawk] Overlord of the oceans.
[man] Awsome Man!
[Knight Hawk] Who possesses a magic word that gives him the power of seven gods.
translation.de: Sein magisches Wort verleiht ihm die Macht von sieben Göttern.

translation.en: Together, we form the Guardians of Justice.
translation.de: Zusammen sind wir die Guardians of Justice.

translation.en: With Marvelous Man gone, there's a power vacuum that could rip this world apart.
translation.de: Das Machtvakuum nach Marvelous Mans Tod könnte die Welt auseinanderreißen.

translation.en: We can't have that happen.
Yeah. How are we gonna do that? All of us combined are not equal to Marvelous Man.
translation.de: Und wie? Wir alle zusammen sind Marvelous Man nicht ebenbürtig.

translation.en: Speak for yourself, human.
Oh, come on. Don't fight.
You're a fucking fish.
What can you do? You can talk to fish. "Oh, wow! I'm so fucking powerful!"
translation.de: Du kannst mit Fischen reden. "Wow! Ich bin so mächtig!"

translation.en: Pathetic street whore. I'm a king, and I demand respect!
translation.de: Jämmerliche Hure. -Ich bin König und verlange Respekt! -Schluss!

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] Enough!
You're supposed to be role models. Heroes.
Try and act like it.
Blue-Scream's right.
None of us compare to Marvelous Man.
translation.de: Wir alle sind Marvelous Man nicht ebenbürtig.

translation.en: But if we work together as a team,
translation.de: Aber wenn wir als Team zusammenarbeiten,

translation.en: we could save this world.
We can honor our fallen Guardian.
translation.de: Wir können unseren gefallenen Guardian ehren.

translation.en: We could strive to be
marvelous.
Everyone knows Marvelous Man didn't just protect a city or a town.
translation.de: Marvelous Man beschützte nicht nur eine Stadt oder einen Ort.

translation.en: He protected the world.
Now that's on us.
Awsome Man, Speed, Golden Goddess,
you're the only ones fast enough to handle an international crisis.
translation.de: nur ihr seid schnell genug für internationale Krisen.

translation.en: There's a squad of cyborg T-Rexes on the loose in Syria.
translation.de: Eine Truppe Cyborg-T-Rexes macht Syrien unsicher.

translation.en: Take them down and bring them to justice.
translation.de: Erledigt sie und lasst Gerechtigkeit walten.

translation.en: Consider it done.
[Knight Hawk] A massive mudslide has thousands trapped and dying.
translation.de: Eine Schlammlawine könnte Tausende Leben kosten.

translation.en: Awsome Man, the Red Cross needs you in Thailand.
translation.de: Awesome Man, das Rote Kreuz braucht dich in Thailand.

translation.en: The Hawk drones will back you up with supplies.
[Hawk drone] Activate.
You can count on me.
[Knight Hawk] Speed, I need you to pick up Blue-Scream and drop him in LA.
translation.de: Speed, hole Blue-Scream ab und bringe ihn nach L.A.

translation.en: A new street drug called "Mellow Devil" is causing people to lose their minds.
translation.de: Eine neue Droge namens Mellow Devil treibt die Leute in den Wahnsinn.

translation.en: -We've got to extinguish the fires. -You got it.
He can't do that alone. I should go with him.
translation.de: Das kann er nicht allein. Ich sollte mitgehen.

translation.en: -I'll be fine. Speed, let's go. -I'm on my way.
[Knight Hawk] Wait, Speed!
After you've dropped Scream in LA, I need you to get back here,
translation.de: Wenn du Scream abgesetzt hast, komm wieder her.

translation.en: because we've gotta get Black Bow to Peru.
Wait, wait, wait. What am I, the Guardians' delivery boy?
translation.de: Bin ich der Lieferjunge der Guardians?

translation.en: You're whatever the Guardians need you to be. Now, move!
translation.de: Du bist, was immer die Guardians brauchen. Bewegung!

translation.en: And me?
[Knight Hawk] The Scottish Skull has hijacked an American submarine
translation.de: Scottish Skull kaperte ein amerikanisches U-Boot

translation.en: off the coast of New Zeamar.
Walker! How did you break this feed?
translation.de: Walker! Wie hast du dich in diesen Feed eingeklinkt?

translation.en: Despite what you'd like to believe, Atticus, there are people smarter than you.
translation.de: Entgegen deiner Annahme, Atticus, gibt es klügere Leute als dich.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] Addison Walker.
She runs a private military group funded by a few dozen corporations.
translation.de: Chefin einer privaten Militärgruppe, von mehreren Firmen finanziert.

translation.en: Her objective? Maintain global economic stability at all cost.
translation.de: Ihr Ziel? Um jeden Preis globale wirtschaftliche Stabilität wahren.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] She's playing chess and only she gets to see the board.
translation.de: Sie spielt Schach, und nur sie sieht das Spielbrett.

translation.en: What do you want?
As you know, Marvelous Man was leading negotiations
for a worldwide nuclear disarmament.
Since his death, those negotiations have spun out of control.
translation.de: Seit seinem Tod sind die Verhandlungen außer Kontrolle.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] That sounds like your problem,
not mine.
Oh. It's going to become everyone's problem soon.
translation.de: Bald ist es unser aller Problem.

translation.en: Because of the questions surrounding Marvelous Man's death,
translation.de: Da Marvelous Mans Tod Fragen aufwirft,

translation.en: every country is pointing the finger at one another.
translation.de: zeigen alle Länder mit dem Finger aufeinander.

translation.en: China is saying Russia had him killed.
translation.de: China sagt, Russland ließ ihn töten.

translation.en: Iran and Iraq are sure the job was done by the Americans.
translation.de: Iran und Irak sind sicher, dass es die Amerikaner waren.

translation.en: That doesn't even make sense.
The steps that lead us to war rarely do.
translation.de: Die Schritte, die zum Krieg führen, ergeben selten Sinn.

translation.en: The only way this ends without an all-out nuclear holocaust
translation.de: Die nukleare Massenvernichtung ist nur abzuwenden,

translation.en: is if you find out who really killed Marvelous Man.
translation.de: wenn du herausfindest, wer Marvelous Man wirklich getötet hat.

translation.en: [Knight Hawk] So you don't think it was a suicide?
I don't.
But from what I hear, neither do you.
translation.de: Wie ich höre, glaubst du es auch nicht.

translation.en: I don't have an opinion.
And I won't have an opinion until my investigation is completed.
translation.de: Ich habe keine Meinung bis zum Ende meiner Ermittlungen.

translation.en: Yes, but I know the problem is you're looking in the wrong place.
translation.de: Ja, aber leider suchst du an der falschen Stelle.

translation.en: Are you fucking with me or what?
You need to look at the Guardians themselves.
translation.de: Nimm die Guardians unter die Lupe.

translation.en: The Guardians? What do you know that I don't?
translation.de: Die Guardians? Weißt du mehr als ich?

translation.en: [Walker] Time is running short. Find the answer.
translation.de: Die Zeit ist knapp. Finde die Antwort.

translation.en: Or I'll arrest you and every one of your super friends
translation.de: Oder ich verhafte dich und alle deine Superfreunde

translation.en: before declaring martial law
on the world.
Knight Hawk to Guardians.
Complete your mission
and report to the Hawk's Nest.
translation.de: und meldet euch in der Hawk-Höhle.

translation.en: Jesus Christ!
That's fucked up, man.
I know. I know. But think about it.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Aber denk mal nach.

translation.en: Marvelous Man is dead. Right? Huh?
So, you think if we wore his skin,
translation.de: Wenn wir seine Haut tragen würden,

translation.en: we'd be bulletproof?
I mean, I guess. I-it's like a bulletproof jacket. You know?
It… it still goes through. It hurts like shit.
translation.de: Die Kugel geht durch, tut weh.

translation.en: [officer 2 laughing] No, it doesn't! At least, I think it doesn't. Shit. I mean…
translation.de: Nein, tut sie nicht. Glaube ich jedenfalls. Ich meine…

translation.en: 'Cause his whole body is bulletproof. It's impenetrable, man. All right?
translation.de: Sein ganzer Körper ist kugelsicher. Undurchdringlich. Okay?

translation.en: If you wore his skin, you'd still be a doughboy with shit muscles.
translation.de: Mit seiner Haut bist du trotzdem speckig mit Kackmuskeln.

translation.en: [officer 2] Oh, fuck you. Fuck you. You know how much I've been lifting.
translation.de: Fick dich. Ich habe Gewichte gestemmt.

translation.en: [officer 1] Yeah, yeah. You're lifting beer and donuts, man.
translation.de: Ja, du stemmst Bier und Donuts.

translation.en: -That still counts. -[officer 1] Yeah. In your world.
[officer 2] What's the count at?
[officer 1] Three and a half. Look at this one.
-[officer 2] Smiley face? -[officer 1] Uh-huh.
-[officer 2] Shit. -[officer 1] Oh, well…
[officer 2] Another smiley face.
[officer 1] Oh, okay. Look at this one here.
translation.de: Okay, sieh dir den hier an.

translation.en: [officer 2] Fucking ground beef. [officer 1] How's that wife of yours, man?
[officer 2] She's good. She's a little stressed out.
Kid had an accident. You know?
-[officer 1] Yeah? -[officer 2] Yeah.
[officer 1 scoffs] Hey, when it rains, it pours.
[officer 2] Tell me about it. I'm missing that single life though.
translation.de: Und ob. Mir fehlt das Single-Leben.

translation.en: [officer 1] Yeah. Look at this one here. The eyeball's out.
translation.de: Ja. Sieh mal. Der Augapfel ist weg.

translation.en: [officer 1] Single life? You are missing it.
-Hey, I forgot to ask you… -[officer 1] What?
-[officer 2] Another smiley face. -[officer 1] Yeah.
[officer 2] How was that… how was that date the other night?
[officer 1] What date? Oh, yeah! The one with the big old…?
translation.de: Welches? Ach ja! Die mit den großen…

translation.en: [officer 2] Yeah, the tig old bitties.
Oh, man, she was… Crazy, but she was nice.
translation.de: Mann, die war… Verrückt, aber sie war nett.

translation.en: [officer 2] Yeah. I fucking love titties, man.
[officer 1] I know you do.
Oh. Look at this. Oh sh--
translation.de: Sieh dir das an. Oh, Sch…

translation.en: -Stinks! -[officer 2] That smells like shit, man.
-[officer 1] Oh, man! -[officer 2] Fucking maggots and shit.
[officer 1] Oh, yeah.
[officer 1] Oh. Look at this one.
[exhales, whispers] Shit.
Got a splitting headache, I guess. I don't know.
That's disgusting.
[officer 1] Check this one out here.
-[officer 2] That's not right, man. -[officer 1] Oh, man. Faceless.
translation.de: -Das ist nicht richtig, Mann. -Oh Mann. Gesichtslos.
